properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 9:03PM PST until February 17 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas 9 to 12 feet at 15 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from
10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 10 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 10 AM PST MONDAY
